subject: Policy on prsenting the cosolidated EOT & variation proposals of completed projects the Variation Committee.
text: 9rdf 7ofly <THT gfuarut 9h19 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (7em 4aa7t 3< 7onHT TAT4) 447 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QRR. /Extn:: 2223 2318 2488 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) #1-5  6, 0q2r-10, ERMT, 7 facr 110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn: Ist June 2011 POLICY MATTER Technical (78/2011) (Decision taken in Item No4 of meeting of the Executive Committee held on 11.4.2011) Sub:   Policy on presenting the consolidated EOT & variation proposals of completed projects before the Variation Committee. As a matter of policy,for proper scrutiny and early closing of contracts, Executive Committee in its 72nd meeting held on 11.4.2011 decided that the cases relating to consolidated EOT & variation  proposals  of the completed projects should be presented to the Variation Committee directly by CGM ROs  Procedure for submission of proposals to Variation Committee have already been circulated vide Circular No.11041/116/2010-Coord dated 25.3.2011 (copy enclosed): RAM OlL (M: Chandrashekhar) GM (Coord:)II To AII CGMs at Hqs. All GMsIDGMs Managers at Hqs. AII ROs EDs All PDs Lib Hindi Officer to: AllI Members CVO PS to Chairman {t U9 NHAL 72nd Copy
